poem:
Title: "In the Shadow of Unheard Voices"

Attend the genderless sun, 
its impartial warmth over man,
as much, neglects not a woman's span.
Yet, echos of silent half in corridors of power,
mark the chill on our dying hour.
Oh Azerbaijan, in your men-chaired debate,
Does not the climate at your gate,
Implore you hear the Earth's whole heart,
And let silenced whispers have their part?
